name: Healthy, Wealthy & Wise - Notion Dashboard
description: Track your health, manage your wealth, and curate your wisdom—all within this powerful all-in-one Notion template.Inspired by Naval Ravikant ‘s tweet storm on the same.What’s Inside:Healthy Dashboard: Keep track of your habits, health info, and set reminders for important dates.Wealthy Dashboard: Manage your assets, liabilities, and intangible assets. Calculate your net worth and stay on top of financial reminders.Wise Dashboard: Capture and organize your favorite articles, books, tweets, videos
features: Healthy Dashboard:Keep track of your habits, health info, and set reminders for important dates.; Wealthy Dashboard:Manage your assets, liabilities, and intangible assets. Calculate your net worth and stay on top of financial reminders.; Wise Dashboard:Capture and organize your favorite articles, books, tweets, videos, and podcasts.; Healthy, Wealthy, Wise(worth $9); Dream, Plan, Evaluate, Ship Daily(worth $9); My Finance Tracker Plus(worth 19$); Learning Dashboard(included for free)
